verses.roman:
svapna dekhi' rūpa-gosāñi karilā vicāra
satya-bhāmāra ājñā--pṛthak nāṭaka karibāra

synonyms: svapna dekhi'-after dreaming; rūpa-gosāñi—Rūpa Gosvāmī; karilā vicāra—considered; satya-bhāmāra ājñā—the order of Śrīmatī Satyabhāmā; pṛthak nāṭaka karibāra-to write a separate drama.
translation: After having that dream, Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī considered, "It is the order of Satyabhāmā that I write a separate drama for her.
